items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to retailer to track unique promotions from banner promotions, email campagins, affiliate sites.
items.users-story: I want to track users visits on the website

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to mail targetted email content to audience segments
items.users-story: I want to encourage usage through emails  to registered Userss

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to subscribe to online, or multiple,  newletters via entering email address
items.users-story: I want to subscribe to newsletter(s)

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display 'Unsubscribe' link via email, which links to the Unsubscribe page for Users to confirm
items.users-story: I want to unsubscribe to newsletter(s) via email

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to access 'Unsubscribe' page within My Account section, for Users to unsubscribe
items.users-story: I want to unsubscribe to newsletter(s) via website

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to select to receive email in text or HTML formats
items.users-story: I want to select email preferences

items.associated-high-level-requirements: Select topics to be emailed about
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to provide multiple types of topics/interests/attributes to support email mail outs targetted to relevant customer segmentation
items.users-story: I want to select topics of interest

items.associated-high-level-requirements: Participate in forums (and all associated tasks)
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to host community software enabling Users to participate in discussions forums, select/create topics, forum to be moderated, etc
items.users-story: I want to participate in forums

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display an index of help topics, linking through to help content
items.users-story: I want to view a list of help topics (by category)

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to enter free text search request to return relevant help content results
items.users-story: I want to search the help database using free text

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display a survey targetting particular audiences to be defined by ouchpoints in the user journey
items.users-story: I want to present an online user feedback survey

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display a smaller promotional modules, customisable by the Instituition  and may contain images, text and hyperlinks
items.users-story: I want multiple smaller promotional spaces to individually hero information

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to link to hub pages, sub-category or deep link directly to product detail pages
items.users-story: I want to be able to access content, groups, communication, events, and what you are following  directly from the homepage

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to target homepage content based upon their user profile, once the user has logged in. Targetted content to be defined withinthe admin site.
items.users-story: I want users to receive targetted homepage content

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display an editable calendar saved to user's profile information, capturing events against dates
items.users-story: I want to add key events to a personal calendar and be emailed a reminder in a timely fashion

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to log in to the My  area, by inputting username and password
items.users-story: I want to access my personal  information within a secure area

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to register personal details, and provide username and password for site registration.
items.users-story: I want to register as a user

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Prompt users to provide email address as unique identifier (unless previous users have provided usernames?), and tips for easy to remember passwords
items.users-story: I want to have a username and password which are easy to remember

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Migrate all existing user data/profile information to the new Commerce platform.
items.users-story: I want my existing user profile data information to be recognised

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to for the business to manage user database, to delete and add new records when necessary
items.users-story: I want to be able to maintain my user database and related profile information

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Email all existing users that their profile information has been migrated
items.users-story: I want to be aware that my profiel information is now available on the new platform

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to request a password reminder via providing username and/or email address. Password to be emailed to users account.
items.users-story: I want to receive my username and password via a confidential/secure process

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to view and modify profile data and save updates
items.users-story: I want to view/edit my personal details

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to modify saved preferences, including  email subscription, email preferences, opt in options, password and username
items.users-story: I want to edit my personal preferences

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to print pages in a user friendly format
items.users-story: I want a printer-friendly page

items.associated-high-level-requirements: View related content (through other users' viewing patterns)
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display additional content that was looked at in relation  to the current content
items.users-story: I want to view other Content that users who look at this also looked at

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display related user comments and ratings
items.users-story: I want to view user reviews and ratings for content

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display a form to capture customers comments and ratings
items.users-story: I want to add user reviews and ratings for content

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to return information exactly matching search query
items.users-story: I want to view relevant content and information as a result of my search

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement:
Ability to display dropdown sort tools to define order of display. Page to be sorted by:
Date, type, name, author, group
items.users-story: I want to sort content listings (by date, type, name, author etc.)

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display number of results, broken and navigatable by pagination
items.users-story: I want to paginate content listings or view all.

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to provide contextual facted navigation to support filtering of content
items.users-story: I want to narrow content listings/ search results using content attributes

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to design page layout in a print friendly format
items.users-story: I want a printer-friendly content  listing pages

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display number of results, broken and navigatable by pagination
items.users-story: I want to paginate group listings or view all.

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to provide contextual facted navigation to support filtering of groups
items.users-story: I want to narrow group listings/ search results using group attributes

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to design page layout in a print friendly format
items.users-story: I want a printer-friendly group listing pages

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display number of results, broken and navigatable by pageination
items.users-story: I want to paginate Member listings or view all.

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to provide contextual facted navigation to support filtering of content
items.users-story: I want to narrow Member listings/ search results using Member attributes

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to design page layout in a print friendly format
items.users-story: I want a printer-friendly Member listing pages

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display personalised content (content, groups etc), targeted at the user based upon their previous  history
items.users-story: I want to have content displayed to me which are relevant to my previous viewng history

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display clear instructions regarding data input of forms, where system rules apply (eg. Passwords must be a minimum of 6 characters with no spaces)
items.users-story: I want to be able to easily fill in forms so I can move quickly and seamlessly from one form to the next

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to feature persistent data in forms, so when 1 form is filled in, the details are captured for duplicates of that field (aside from secure fields such as Password)
items.users-story: I do not want to have to fill in the same data multiple times

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to highlight input boxes with an error message, which have not been system validated, and to display a relevant message at the top of the returned page
items.users-story: I want to be clearly aware of any information I have not completed correctly

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to contain thumbnails and links of most recently viewed details pages in a persistent module
items.users-story: I want to see my most-recently viewed content, groups, members

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display Primary navigation mapped to major categories
items.users-story: I want to have easy and consistent access to the top priority links (primary nav)

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display secondary navigation links
items.users-story: I want to have easy and consistent access to secondary links

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to navigate by logical facets, dependant on areas attributes
items.users-story: I want to be able to have multiple types of categories available to navigate by my particular mindset

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display hyperlinked breadcrumb trails, and clear identifiers as to product categories
items.users-story: I want to be clearly aware of what section I'm within on the website

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to provide visual idenitifier for any links launching a new window, or linking users to a third party site
items.users-story: I want to be aware of when I am leaving the current website structure

items.core-notes: see Dr Mike Baxter's design pattern: http://www.e-consultancy.com/news-blog/361212/search-box-e--commerce-design-pattern.html. Hygiene factor: important to have a good, thorough search function, that can search for keywords and products.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to enter keywords in a input box to perform a search query. This includes, members, content, groups etc
items.users-story: I want to search all information eligible to me using free text

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to predict completion of words (mapped to dictionary)
items.users-story: I want search result options displayed as I type my search string (cf. Google suggest)

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability for system to perform a dictionary look up to display closest matching word
items.users-story: I want the system to correct my misspelt search terms automatically

items.core-notes: Needs to have a nice no results page,
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability for system to perform a dictionary/thesauras look up to suggest closest matches
items.users-story: I want the system to recommend alternative search (word) options

items.core-notes: Include Boolean operators, wildcards etc. << a guiding form UI or allow operators in the quick search box only?
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display a page of additional search queries and multiple attributes
items.users-story: I want to search by selecting criteria (advanced search)

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display a link to the My  log in page
items.users-story: I want to be able to log in to My  area

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display a link to New user registration page in the Header
items.users-story: I want to register as a user

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display links of help category topics mapped to the products/content the user is browsing
items.users-story: I want to have access to more help where I need it (contextual help)

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display full set of secondary level navigation links, Instituition links and services in the footer as well as SEO text
items.users-story: I want to display text links at the bottom of page of my complete product and service offerings, and to support SEO

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display text in footer
items.users-story: I want to display legal copyright information consistently throughout site

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display support links in header
items.users-story: I want to have easy access to website utility/service links (i.e. help, contact etc)

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to display Instituition logo and branded message/proposition in header. Content to be easily updated by Instituitiuons
items.users-story: I want to be able to clearly display my branding and website proposition (differentiator) consistently in site header, with my Logo

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Other users can be assigned as content managers, by the creator or other managers.
items.users-story: Content can be managed by many people

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Following content allows the user who is following to recieve updates about changes, comments to the content. Managers automatically follow the content
items.users-story: Users can follow content

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Following a group allows the user who is following to recieve updates about additions comments and content to the group. Managers automatically follow the group. sub groups are not automatically followed
items.users-story: Users can follow groups

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: The event can be created for a piece of content, or a group or various members. It includes a reminder functionality which is configurable
items.users-story: Users can create/modify a dated event and assign themselves and other members to that date

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Users of that group can view the content, and automatically become followers of that content
items.users-story: Groups can have content assigned to them

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: The content can be availble to those members of a certain group, all members, the public or private to that individual. The user can assign different users/people to view the content when logged in.
items.users-story: Content Managers can control who can sees the content

items.associated-high-level-requirements:
Set group permissions;
Set group privacy.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: The groups can be available to defined members, all members, the public. The user can assign different users/people to view the group when logged in.
items.users-story: Group Managers can control who can sees the Groups

items.associated-high-level-requirements:
Suspend/unsuspend content;
Notification of content status changes (eg. suspended, unsuspended).
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Content can be suspended and unsuspended. Suspended content cannot be edited, commented on, followed, deleted or searched upon by users. Managers will see the content and see that it has been suspended. Those users that are involved with the content will be notified of the suspension
items.users-story: Suspend/unsuspend content

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Groups can be suspended and unsuspended. Suspended groups cannot be edited, commented on, followed, deleted, joined or searched upon by users. Managers and users will see the group and see that it has been suspended. Managers and users cannot see any attributes, content, membership lists or details of a suspended group. Those users that are involved with the group will be notified of the suspension
items.users-story: Suspend/unsuspend groups

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Users can be suspended and unsuspended. Suspended users  can not login to their account. On attempting to login a warning message will be displayed letting them know that they have been suspended and who to contact. Suspended users can still be seen by others and assigned to groups, content etc
items.users-story: users

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Members of a group can be suspended and unsuspended by managers of a group that has been created by a user. Only Admin users can suspend members from a group they have created. Suspended members cannot edit, comment, follow, re-join or search within that group. Users cannot see any attributes, content, membership lists or details within the group they have been suspended from.
items.users-story: Suspend/unsuspend Members

items.associated-high-level-requirements:
Block/unblock content;
Notify users of content status change (eg blocked).
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Content can be blocked and unblocked. Blocked content cannot be seen by members or managers, only administrators. Those users that are involved with the content will be notified of the blocking.
items.users-story: Block/unblock content

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Groups can be blocked and unblocked. Blocked groups cannot be seen by members or managers, only administrators. Those users that are involved with the groups will be notified of the blocking.
items.users-story: Block/unblock groups

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Members can be blocked and unblocked. Blocked members cannot be seen by members or managers, only administrators. Upon attempting to Log in a warning message will be displayed letting them know that they have been blocked and who to contact.
items.users-story: Block/unblock members

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Sharing content allows users to send a link to the content to other members/people depending on the privacy settings of the content.
items.users-story: Content can be shared

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Sharing groups allows users to send a link to the group to other members/people depending on the privacy settings of the group
items.users-story: Groups can be shared

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Content can be viewed within the website in a variety of different forms
items.users-story: Content can be viewed

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Content can be deleted by managers/Adminstrators. Deleted content can no longer be seen by users or managers. a warning is displayed to ensure they are sure befopre it is deleted. Administrators can undelete content. Deleted content will be retained for a configurable amount of time. Followers of the content will be notified of its deletion, or its undeletion
items.users-story: Content can be deleted

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Groups setup by Managers can be deleted by Managers/Adminstrators. Groups setup by Administrators can only be deleted by Administrators. Deleted groups can no longer be seen by users or managers. A warning is displayed to ensure they are sure before it is deleted. Administrators can undelete groups. Deleted groups will be retained for a configurable amount of time. Followers/members of that group will be notified of its deletion, or its undeletion
items.users-story: Groups can be deleted

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Members of a group setup by Managers can be deleted by Managers/Adminstrators. Members of a group setup by Administrators can only be deleted by Administrators. Deleted group members can no longer be seen by users or managers. A warning is displayed to ensure they are sure before it is deleted. Administrators can undelete Members of a group. Details of the members deleted from a group will be retained for a configurable amount of time.
items.users-story: Members of a group can be deleted

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Users can be deleted by Adminstrators only. Deleted users can no longer be seen by other users. A warning is displayed to ensure they are sure before it is deleted. Administrators can undelete users. Deleted users details/content/attributes will be retained for a configurable amount of time. Followers of the user will be notified of its deletion.
items.users-story: Users can be deleted

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Content can be edited. The editing method depends on the type of content. some will be edited online, some edited offline.
items.users-story: Content can be edited

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: If content is edited the old version is retained so that a manager/administrator can review/ roll back to or copy prior versions
items.users-story: Content can be versioned

items.creator: EA
items.users-story: Content can have different permissions

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: When content is changed users following, groups members where the content sits or the managers are notified that the content has been changed and sent a link to that content
items.users-story: Notifictations are sent out when content is changed

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: This depends on the type of content and can be done in different ways, e.g. uploading files, inline editing. Permissions, privacy and attributes are set upon creation. These can be inherited by its position in a hierachy. the creator of the content automatically becomes a manager of that content
items.users-story: Content can be created

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Content can be saved as a draft version, prior to making the content live
items.users-story: Content can be saved as draft

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Groups can be created, Permissions, privacy and attributes are set upon creation. These can be inherited by its position in a hierachy. The creator of the group automatically becomes a manager of that group. Others can be assigned at point of creatition or after to manage the group
items.users-story: Groups can be created

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Groups can be saved as a draft version, prior to making the group live
items.users-story: Groups can be saved as draft

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Users can be set up individually or imported from a file.
items.users-story: Users can be created

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Content can be seen by managers at any time. Users can see the content only between the given dates. When the content is outside of these dates it is seen as draft
items.users-story: Content can have a start date and end date.

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Groups can be seen by managers at any time. Users can see the Groups only between the given dates. When the groups are outside of these dates it is seen as draft
items.users-story: Groups can have a start date and end date.

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: When the content is viewed other content can be seen to be associated with it. The association is created by the managers, it could be ther own content or other content
items.users-story: Content can be associated with other content.

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: When the Group is viewed other groups can be seen to be associated with it. The association is created by the managers.
items.users-story: Groups can be associated with other Groups.

items.associated-high-level-requirements: Content can contain content (create subgroups of content).
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Certain types of content can host other content e.g. folders of files, image galleries, web pages can have files attached to them
items.users-story: Content can have other content within it

items.associated-high-level-requirements:
Set privacy level (content);
Allow adding comments (content) if user is permitted.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Private content can only be commented on my Managers, Public content can be commented on by anyone with the rights to view that content
items.users-story: Content can be private or public to comment on

items.associated-high-level-requirements: View most viewed content (by institution or group).
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: A list of content will be given that is configurable in length. this will be based on how many times it has been viewed
items.users-story: The ability to see the most viewed content within the institution, or group

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: A list of groups will be given that is configurable in length. this will be based on how many times the group has been viewed/accessed
items.users-story: The ability to see the most viewed groups within the institution, or sub groups within a group

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Managers can tag content. Tags are keywords that can be used to narrow searches or search upon. These are viewable in the profile for the content. Tags are also used to SEO the content
items.users-story: Content can be tagged

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Managers can tag groups. Tags are keywords that can be used to narrow searches or search upon. These are viewable in the profile for the group. Tags are also used to SEO groups
items.users-story: Groups can be tagged

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Tag clouds exits to help users see popular tags.The number of tags viewable in the cloud is configurable. Tag clouds of content can reside within a group as well
items.users-story: Tag clouds of content tags can be viewed.

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Tag clouds exits to help users see popular tags.The number of tags viewable in the cloud is configurable.
items.users-story: Tag clouds of group tags can be viewed.

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Users can see a content listing of all of their content
items.users-story: Users can view their own content. Ones that they are a manager of and/or ones they are a group member where the content resides or a follower of files,

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Content can be searched on from any of its attributes, e.g. name, tags, content type etc. Only poeple who have the right to search for that content can see that content
items.users-story: Content can be searched upon

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Groups can be searched on from any of its attributes, e.g. name, tags, group type etc. only users who have the right to see the group can search for that group
items.users-story: Groups can be searched upon

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Users can see a content listing of all of their content
items.users-story: Groups can view their own Groups. Ones that they are a manager of and/or ones they are a member/follower of

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Users can be searched on from any of its attributes, e.g. name, tags, user type etc. only users who have the right to see that type of user can search for that user
items.users-story: Users can be searched upon

items.associated-high-level-requirements:
Set limits on file size of uploaded content (optional);
Resize/compress files for a content type.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Uploaded file size limits can be set. Files can be automatically resized/compressed where possible fro that content type
items.users-story: Filesizes can be limited

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Users can download content. the output of the download is dependant on the type of content.
items.users-story: Users can download content

items.associated-high-level-requirements: Set display name for content in addition to its filename.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Managers can change the name of the content.
items.users-story: Content can have a name different to its file name

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Content that is created will be indexed. this inclues any files that can be understood by the system E.g. word/text documents
items.users-story: Content can be searched within, e.g keywords

items.creator: EA
items.users-story: Admin can determine if searching within, i.e indexing content is allowed

items.creator: EA
items.users-story: Users can send a message to the managers of the content

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: If a virus is detected then the user is alerted and the file deleted.
items.users-story: Files are scanned for viruses

items.associated-high-level-requirements: Specify types for allowed uploaded content.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Only files of the type sepcifed here can be uploaded by users
items.users-story: File types that can be uploaded can be restricted by the Administrator

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: The profile is made up of the attributes set upon creation, e.g. name, file type, date created, dated edited, managers, followers, groups it belongs to, associated content etc
items.users-story: Each piece of content has a profile

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: The profile is made up of the attributes set upon creation, and ones that can be set after, e.g. name, location, dated created, groups member of, content created, photo, etc.
items.users-story: Each user has their own profile

items.associated-high-level-requirements:
Manage group profile;
View group profile.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: The profile is made up of the attributes set upon creation and those set afterwards, e.g. name,  date created, managers, followers, members, groups it belongs to, logo etc
items.users-story: Each group has a profile

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Depending on the content type/restrictions, where a file can be uploaded, then multiple files can be uploaded
items.users-story: Multiple files can be uploaded at once

items.creator: EA
items.users-story: Sakai 2 sites can be linked

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: This is dependent if you are a follower, member of a group or manager of that content. The number of items on the list is configurable
items.users-story: Users can see the latest changes/created content

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: This is the most recent content that the user has viewed. The number of items on the list is configurable
items.users-story: Users can see the last viewed content

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: This is dependent if you are a follower, member of a group or manager of that group and a sub group has been created. The number of items on the list is configurable
items.users-story: Users can see the latest created groups

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: This is the most recent groups that the user has viewed. The number of items on the list is configurable
items.users-story: Users can see the last viewed groups

items.associated-high-level-requirements: Manager can preview content as different type of user.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Different types of content may have a different view dependant on if you are a student, or instructor for example. The previwer can choose what type of user to preview the content as.  This is opened in a different window so they can navigate around the group
items.users-story: Mangers can preview content as a different type of user

items.associated-high-level-requirements: Manager can preview group as different type of user.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Managers of a group will have a different view of a group than a member/follower/user. The previwer can choose what type of user to preview the group as. This is opened in a different window so they can navigate around the group
items.users-story: Mangers can preview groups as a different type of user

items.associated-high-level-requirements: View followers of content (depending on content's privacy settings).
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Dependant on the privacy settings users can see who is following the content
items.users-story: Users can see who is following the content

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Dependant on the privacy settings
items.users-story: Users can see who is managing the content

items.associated-high-level-requirements: Set permissions on viewing content attributes.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Managers can limit what is seen and searched upon from a list of the attributes.
items.users-story: Limits how users see attributes of the content, or the content

items.associated-high-level-requirements: View followers of a group (depending on group's privacy settings).
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Dependant on the privacy settings
items.users-story: Users can see who is following a group

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Dependant on the privacy settings
items.users-story: Users can see who is managing the group

items.associated-high-level-requirements: Set group profile privacy (ie determining which elements of a profile are shown/hidden).
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Managers can limit what is seen and searched upon from a list of the attributes of a group
items.users-story: Limits how users see attributes of the group

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Users can limit what is seen and searched upon from a list of their attributes.
items.users-story: Limits how users see attributes of another user

items.associated-high-level-requirements: Warning to user when content uploaded/created (if applicable).
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: The users may have to accept the warning by checking a box, or it may form just a textual warning. this is dependant on the content type and may be a legal warning, or a helpful warning
items.users-story: When content is uploaded/created a notice may be displayed giving the user a warning

items.associated-high-level-requirements: Set warnings for different content types.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Admins can set wether it is a visual warning or a visual; and acceptance warning.
items.users-story: Warnings can be set for different content types

items.associated-high-level-requirements: Linking content in different places (to same original file).
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: A piece of content can live in many different locations, but the actual content is only one piece of content
items.users-story: When content is changed, the content is changed wherever the content resides

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Content can be duplicated. When it is duplicated it is placed as your content. Previous versions of the content are not retained, nor are the other managers/followers. The content resides as your content only.
items.users-story: Content can be duplicated

items.associated-high-level-requirements:
Block/unblock followers;
Notification of content access changes.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Followers of content can be blocked/unblocked. if you are blocked from following content then you are notified
items.users-story: Users who are following content who are blocked are no longer listed as following the content or sent notifications of updates/changes to the content.

items.associated-high-level-requirements:
Block/unblock followers;
Notification of group access changes (eg blocked, unblocked).
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Followers of groups can be blocked/unblocked. if you are blocked from following a group then you are notified
items.users-story: Users who are following groups who are blocked are no longer listed as following the group or sent notifications of updates/changes to the group.

items.associated-high-level-requirements:
Duplicate group;
Duplicate parts of a group.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: A group can be duplicated, the duplicator decides what information is retained within that group,e .g. all or some members, priavacy attributes, content etc.
items.users-story: A whole group or parts of a group can be duplicated

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: When a group is created the users has the option to create a draft group, or a live group, with all of the various group attributes open to edit e.g. start/end dates, members, privacy settings etc
items.users-story: A group can be created

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: A member can be added to a group by a manager if the group has been created by a manager. Members can be existing Sakai users or people who are external to sakai. When selecting from exisiting users, the managers will see them as a member list with various sorting, searching, narrowing options
items.users-story: Members can be added to a group

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: They are notifeid when changes are made to content or the group, but cannot participate in the group. The settings will detrmine wether they can follow a group or not
items.users-story: Users can follow a group.

items.associated-high-level-requirements:
Manage group content;
Assign content to group (content).
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Members/managers can add content to a group dependant on the group settings
items.users-story: A group can have content

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Users can ask to join a group that has been set up by a manager. The manager has the ability to set the group to automatic admission or vet each applicant to the group
items.users-story: Users can ask to join a group

items.associated-high-level-requirements:
Leave a group;
Permissions on leaving a group.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: There must be at least one manager of a group. Members/managers of a group cannot leave a group that has been setup by an administrator
items.users-story: A member/manager can leave a group

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: This list may be sorted, or added to at any time. The collection can be used to set up a group from
items.users-story: A collection or list of users is gathered by one user

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Users can ask to become a contact of another user either by asking or inviting. The recipient can choose to accept or ignore the request. If they become contacts then they are added to their contact list. When a contact request is accepted then the requestor is notified
items.users-story: Users may become contacts of other users

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Contacts can be removed from a contact list at any time by a user. This removes the link at both ends
items.users-story: It is possible to break a contact link

items.aar: Not sure about admin send to all, depends on what admin means
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: One person can send to one or many people. Admin have the option to send to all. The person who is sent a message is notified that they have a message. Managers can send to Members, Users can send to other users that they have in their contact list. Members can send other members of the same group a message, Members can send managers of the group a message. Files, links and formatting can be added to the messages
items.users-story: Users can send certain people a message which can be replied to.

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: A notification is recieved by a user, when they log in to Sakai or an email is sent to their email address, prompting them to log in to view there notification. the notification contains a link to the subject matter. this may be a message, changes to content, changes to groups, Administrator messages etc.
items.users-story: A notification is recieved due to some activity that is pertinent to you.

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: The people who are sent a message are notified that they have a message through a notification. It is possible in the privacy settings to disallow group communication by members. In this case Managers and Admin can still send group messages
items.users-story: Members of a group can send the whole group a message which can be replied to individually

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: The group type enables groups to be badeged e.g. Academic, Social, Student. the list of attributes are set by the Admin. The only purpose of these is to search on and to see by other users
items.users-story: Groups can be given a type/purpose that is visible to others

items.associated-high-level-requirements:
Defined list of group types;
Warnings associated with creation of particular group types.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: The list can be as long as the Admin team want it to be. When a group is created a warning can be added here that is visible for the group creator
items.users-story: A list of Group types can be defined

items.associated-high-level-requirements: View your interactions with a group.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: The list can be sorted by date or interaction type. Interaction types include, communication, adding content, inviting other user. managers can additionally see where they have changed settings, blocked/suspended/deleted members etc.
items.users-story: A member of a group can see their interactions within a group as a list with a link to that interaction.

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Users can write a set number of chars free text on each member/friend that they have an association with through a group or otherwise. This is only seen by that users and not by the person on who it is written. an example maybe - very intelligent, someone to ask about deadlines
items.users-story: Within a list of people a comment can be set that is only seen by the writer of that comment

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Sub groups can be set up by a member, manager or admin. The setting up of a sub group can be limited by the Admin or Manager in the group settings. This can mean that members/managers cannot set up sub groups. Sub groups can be listed and navigated through. each sub group has it's own profile and acts like it's own group. The creator of the group can select which characteristics of the parent group it inherits e.g. member list.
items.users-story: A group can have many sub groups

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: It is possible to let other people know about the group. the type of sharing depends on the group settings, a private group cannot be shared outside of the user list, a public group can be shared with anyone and will include the ability for social media sharing e.g. Digg
items.users-story: It is possible to tell other people about a group

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Groups are presented as a list, groups that have sub groups are visually distinguished form each other. Groups that have sub groups can be browsed and the sub groups displayed. The list of groups can be sorted by the viewable attributes in the list. The group name, type, date created number of members, numbers of followers is visible
items.users-story: It is possible to browse through groups in a hierarchical fashion

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: For non members of a group this is just the profile information with where appropriate an request to join link. Members, Managers and Admin get each get a different list of actions they can perform within the group. The group overview page is setup from a template. It can contain links to added content, sub group list and navigation, member lists, profile, group information e.g. name, logo.
items.users-story: Each group has an overview page

items.associated-high-level-requirements:
Change group position in group hierarchy;
Permissions on making group hierarchy changes.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Managers/Admin can change where a group resides in a hierarchy dependant on their access restrictions. they want to make a sub,sub group just a sub group. Only Admins can move groups from one are to another unrelated area
items.users-story: It is possible to change where a group sits in the hierarchy of groups/sub groups

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: The list of groups can be sorted by the seen attributes, these include name, type, creation date, number of members, number of followers
items.users-story: It is possible to show a list of groups that a user is a member and/or a follower of

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: A badge is a limited text field that is seen by other members of the group and can be searched on but not sorted by. this could be treasurer, group leader etc
items.users-story: A member of a group can be given a badge

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: A query box is provided where a text string can be entered that searches on the name, tags and type of groups and other attributes that can be seen by that user
items.users-story: It is possible to search for a group using free format text

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: This can be limited by a manager to either, managers, members or all. The list of members can be sorted by date joined, name, badge description
items.users-story: it is possible to view the members of a group

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: This is a setting in the privacy setting of each group. if a setting is set by the admin then a manager cannot overwrite it
items.users-story: A group can be private and only seen by the members and Admins

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: The manager sets this setting, this can be changed at any time. This will dictate the options seen when a users is viewing the group profile. By invite only can be either by managers/admin or by all members of that group
items.users-story: Groups can be open to join by any of the following request, invite, open

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Each group have their own members and profile but can share privacy and other settings
items.users-story: Multiple groups can be created

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: A file can be uploaded that contains the group profile, hierarchy, members, settings
items.users-story: Groups can be created by importing a file

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: A file can be uploaded in a format where the file contains a list of user id's or email addresses to make members of. emaila ddresess ccan only be used for groups that rae open to external people
items.users-story: Members of a group can be defined by a file

items.associated-high-level-requirements:
Set attributes for multiple groups en masse;
Browse groups.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: A manager can browse a list of groups thay have a right to amnage, select ,multiple groups and apply settings to these, e.g. end date, privacy settings etc
items.users-story: Settings for many groups/sub groups can be set en masse

items.aar: date of birth should not appear here. The set of fields which cannot be user-changed should be definied by the admin for the system and not by these requirements.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Users cannot change their name, date of birth or other data set by Admin. They can upload a photo, create tags etc. Privacy settings can be set to limit what others can see
items.users-story: Each users has a profile that can be changed by themselves and viewed by others

items.associated-high-level-requirements: Sync data between institution and Sakai database
items.creator: EA
items.users-story: Data can be synced between the institution and the Sakai database

items.associated-high-level-requirements: Fake students in system to be used for training.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Certain managers/ Admin can have access to test ids. These test id's can also be used as fake students that are only seen by the managers they are assigned to be seen by
items.users-story: Managers/ admin can use fake students to test creation of groups, content etc

items.associated-high-level-requirements: Export group information (eg. list of subgroups, members etc)
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Associated data can be exported with the list e.g. group name, type, creation date etc.
items.users-story: It si possible to export a list of sub groups or members as a file

items.associated-high-level-requirements:
Default privacy settings;
Default group settings.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Default privacy and group settings can be set up by the admin
items.users-story: when creating a group some settings are set to certain positions be default

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: If a Admin sets up a group than only an admin can create a manager of that group. A manager can assign other managers if they or another manager created a group
items.users-story: Creation of new groups can be limited

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Only admin can split an admin created group. The number of splits can be defined and the members of each split group selected, settings are inherited and the name, type can be edited at the point of splitting. Members can be automatically split by random selection. once split groups cannot be unsplit
items.users-story: groups can be split into different groups

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Only admin can merge groups that they have created. Merged groups have a new name and the profile/settings are entered or selected form an existing group. Multiple groups can be merged at one time. members are notified of the merging. All members become members of this group. The old groups no longer exist
items.users-story: Groups can be merged

items.core-notes: Does this have a public/member version
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Profiles can have content added to it that describes the group e.g. web pages, video. This is what is seen publicly as well as by logged in users
items.users-story: Profiles can have content added to it that describes the group e.g. web pages, video

items.core-notes: Not sure on this, need to work through
items.creator: EA
items.users-story: Group types can have pre-defined templates for privacy, settings, sub groups etc

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: On group creation, manager chooses location in hierrachy, and sets up group profile and other settings. New members get notified of their inclusion
items.users-story: When viewing a list of users, a person can create a group from this list of users.

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Automatic membership of groups is defined by who is doing the inviting and under which group type . Invited users of the institution are automatcially added as members. if the group type is institution then a manager invited user is automatically joined. All other instances are by invite only
items.users-story: Users can automatically be added to a group or receive an invite to join a group which they can refuse

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Upon login they are either taken to their own overview page, or they are passed through to the page they originally requested that required a log in
items.users-story: Users are able to log in to Sakai

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: user listing, same as member listing
items.users-story: A list of users is presented and can be sorted and narrowed

items.associated-high-level-requirements: Add person to group from contact list.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: The contact list is searchable and sortable by Alpha, date added
items.users-story: When adding users the user can choose from their contact list. Users may be selected for various reason for adding to a group, sedning a message etc

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to request a password reminder via providing username and/or email address. Password to be emailed to users account. If credit card details are saved, user is requested to provide a new password
items.users-story: I want to receive my username and password via a confidential/secure process

items.associated-high-level-requirements: View related content (related through explicit group/tag/links/etc).
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: The content displayed is either manager created or it is generated from the content tags, the groups it may belong to, keywords matching the title. There is a link to view more which links to the search results page that returns all related content, the user can then narrow and sort the list
items.users-story: The ability to view related content

items.core-notes: Needs to have a nice no results page,
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability for the system to look for know data tyepes and convert it e.g Week 1 might be a date range as well
items.users-story: I want the system to semantically search data

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to set up what the working week is e.g. Mon-Fri, sat,sun is days off
items.users-story: I want to set up the working week for the institution

items.associated-high-level-requirements: Institution - set up appropriate calendaring system
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Ability to set up the calendaring system, e.g. date range one e.g. 14/09/2010-21/09/2010, 7 days may fit with term 1 , week 5, or semester 2 week 3
items.users-story: I want to set up the calendaring system of the institution

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: working on
items.users-story: working on

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: working on
items.users-story: working on

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement:
This shall have the following attributes, 
Name of the entity group and its relation e.g. for a group it would be "show sub groups".
Sort by drop down and submit button - recent, a-z, z-a,
Scrollable area which shows image for each entity, name. Both the image and name are linkable to that entity.
View all link that links to the search results page
items.users-story: The ability to view the most recent data from an entity set e.g. my groups, sub groups of a group

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: The ability to set up templates
items.users-story: Templates can be changed so that users see different versions of the view profile page, depending on the initial setup

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: A member of a group can share content with all members of a group. A non-member of a group can request that the content be shared with the group. A manager has to approve the content before it is shared with others. the manager of the content does not have any more rights once the content is shared than before. Admins can share any content with any group e.g. IT security policy
items.users-story: Content can be shared with groups

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: This will display a list of content with the ability to approve or disallow a piece of content. The resultant action by the manager will notify the manager of the content of the resultant action i.e. allowing or not allowing of their content to become part of there group. The manager of the content still retains management of the content once allowed. Mangers can disallow a piece of content at a later date.
items.users-story: The ability to approve a piece of content that has been requested to be added to a group by a non member

items.associated-high-level-requirements: Assign a name to groups of sub-groups.
items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: When the sub groups are listed they can be referenced by this term. This can be used in the profile overview page to list the sub groups e.g. football team might call it's sub groups teams, a course might call it's sub groups lectures, or modules, or even by lecturer.
items.users-story: A manager of a group can give it's sub groups a term by which it's sub groups are known.

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Each image has it's own profile where users can download different formats and see it's attributes, Managers can perform actions on this. An image can be linked to a URL
items.users-story: An image can be seen and searched for as a piece of content

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: The Ability to select an image within a gallery to represent the gallery, if no image is selected then the first alpha image is chosen. The gallery itself is searchable when represented in the search view and can be narrowed as though it was a list of images. Galleries cannot have sub galleries. Images also retain there own attributes and will be searched upon. An image can be selected and it's profile viewed.
items.users-story: A gallery can be seen and searched for as a piece of content

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Each video/audio has it's own profile where users can download different formats and see it's attributes, Managers can perform actions on this.
items.users-story: A Video/Audio file can be seen and searched for as a piece of content

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: The ability to select an image within a gallery to represent the gallery, if no image is selected then the first alpha image is chosen. The gallery itself is searchable when represented in the search view and can be narrowed as though it was a list of images. Galleries cannot have sub galleries. Images also retain there own attributes and will be searched upon. An image can be selected and it's profile viewed.
items.users-story: A file/document can be seen and searched for as a piece of content

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Each Web site has it's own profile where users can see it's attributes, Managers can edit the website.Websites can have multiple pages. Each page is added manually. Navigation can be added to the website if more than one page sits within the website. The position of each webpage can sit in a hierarchy that is contained within the navigation. Managers can edit any content within the website.
items.users-story: A Web site can be seen and searched for as a piece of content

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Forums can sit within a group, they can also sit outside of a group. If they are inside a group than the forum automatically adds the other group members to it.  People external to group can be added as with other content. If the forum is not within a group then users/people can be added to this. each forum has a profile page that can be viewed
items.users-story: A Forum can be seen and searched for as a piece of content

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: Files can be added to the multiple files. A single file will become multiple files if a file is added to it. Managers are managers of all files in a multiple file folder, included ones added afterwards. Users are also users of new files added as well of existing files
items.users-story: Multiple files/Documents can be seen and searched for as a piece of content

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: The ability to have the functionality of a blog, you can follow a blog and be a manager but cannot be a member.
items.users-story: A Blog can be seen and searched for as a piece of content

items.creator: EA
items.functional-requirement: An event can be HTML or plain text. Followers get notified of any change as well as attendees. If the event is open then anyone can attend otherwise it's restricted to those that have been invited or those that request to joining the invite. The manager(s) of the event can select those who are attending. The requestor gets notified of there decision. Reminders get sent out at set times to all managers/attendees/followers. Events can have content added to them e.g. sites
items.users-story: An Event can be seen and searched for

items.functional-requirement: Admin can give status updates, take down the system for maintanence
items.users-story: See problems with the system

items.functional-requirement: Content can be added to web page content. There should be a method of displaying that content e.g a list with a title that links to the content. The content is added through a system and not manually e.g. not through anchor links but through a menu driven system e.g. Select from my content.
items.users-story: Users can see content within a sakai web sites

items.functional-requirement: The ability to select a type of copyright e.g. CCC for a piece of content where applicable
items.users-story: Content can have a copyright notice shown alongside the content
Admin can select different types of copyright and associated notices to go along side the copyright for content on the site
